signInPrompt: Enter details to sign in or add an account.
signUpPrompt: Join the community to start sharing.
chooseAccountPrompt: Select an account to continue or log in with a new one.
welcomeDescription: Connect with friends, share your moments, and discover a universe of amazing content.
settingsDescription: Manage your account preferences and privacy settings
profileInfoDescription: Update your profile details and photo
themeDescription: Select the theme for the application.
languageDescription: Select the language for the application.
